Bill de hOra wrote:
> Oh please, you sound like a witchfinder.

But a witchfinder that depends upon the witches using Craft names in 
public or public names in circle during a time of persecution instead of 
using an identifier appropriate to the context :)

The design flaw in 
http://example.net/doSomethingWith?id=sensitiveIdentifier isn't at the 
level of the application design that REST deals with.
